siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan has been on a purging spree. He’s thinking about reading the Marie Kondo book and taking this to a whole new level. That’s actually the main topic of this episode, but somehow we touch on modern art, Andy Warhol, white space in design. Ultimately this is a…

frontmatter.title: This Episode Sparks Joy
tags: life with a twist of lemon
